name: The Wind's Will
description:
Disclaimer: This is a game that got developed for the global game jam 2023, with the topic "roots" in mind.

Credit to:

dark_lawz (artist): https://dark-lawz.itch.io/

Patschepfote (UI & Programming & BGM): https://github.com/Patschepfote

Arrenteks (Programmer): https://github.com/Arrenteks

UmbraLux (Programmer & Project-Leader): https://umbraluxx.itch.io/

Description:

Control a wind current and accompany a lonely dandelion seed on its journey to a new home. Dodge dangers and carry the seed as far as possible so that it can take root and start a new generation at which many new flowers will emerge.

Mini-Tutorial:

- Left-Mouse Button to float

- collect energy bubbles, otherwise you'll lose that ability

- get as far as possible
